segment.tokens: with he is the of the Tree Squirrels
“ He is n't so very much than Striped Chipmunk
that he is less than half as as myself
His coat is his waistcoat white
his tail is about as long as his body and flat but not very broad
At once Chatterer quick temper flared up
Old Mother Nature told Happy Jack to go on
“ He spends more of his time in the trees
” is especially of pine trees and other cone-bearing trees
He likes the deeper parts of the Green Forest better
though he seems to feel just as much at home on the edge of the Green Forest , especially ”
if it is near a farm where he can steal corn
Chatterer was silenced once more Old Mother Nature
quite as if he had n't been interrupted
“ He is very of the seeds of cone-bearing trees
He cuts the cones from the trees
Then they ripen on the ground , where he can get at the seeds easily
where he can get at the seeds easily
He often has a number of store-houses
He stores up cone seeds acorns nuts corn
corn when he can get it
He builds a nest of leaves and strips of bark , sometimes in a hollow tree and sometimes high up in the branches of an evergreen tree
He jumps from tree to tree
“ You do the same thing to me
when you have the chance ” sputtered Chatterer
the chance is n't often ” sputtered Chatterer
Happy Jack turned his back to Chatterer
“ He does n't seem to mind cold weather at all
as long as the sun shines
His noisy tongue is to be heard on the coldest days of winter
He is the sauciest most impudent of the Green Forest never so happy
when he is making trouble for others
every time he jerks his tail
the spring when the birds are nesting
Worse than that in the spring when the birds are nesting he turns robber
Chatterer could contain himself no longer
he jerked his tail so hard so fast
that Peter Rabbit almost expected to see
He called Happy Jack names all the bad names
all the bad names he could think
He worked himself up into such a rage that it was some time before Old Mother Nature could quiet him
before Old Mother Nature could quiet him
When at last he stopped from sheer lack of breath
In many ways you are a to the Green Forest
how the Green Forest could get along without you
that you eat some insects at times
that sometimes you have a storehouse down in the ground
what you know about your cousin , Happy Jack . ”
For a few minutes Chatterer sulked
“ I do n't know much good about him
“ And you do n't know much bad about me either
Old Mother Nature held up a warning hand
“ Happy Jack is more than twice as as I
at that I 'm not of him
“ He is all over except underneath , where he is white
He has a tremendously big tail
it off whenever he has a chance
he has a way folding his hands on his breast
unless it is to keep them warm in cold weather
He builds a nest very much like mine
Sometimes it is in a hollow tree
quite as often it is in the branches of a tree
He is a good in the tree-tops
he spends a good deal of his time on the ground
especially where there are many nut trees
where he stores up nuts for winter
he buries in the ground under the leaves more than he puts in his storehouse
than he puts in his storehouse
In winter he hunts for those buried nuts
somehow he manages to find them
even when they are covered with snow
unwatched around one of my storehouses . ”
